Reviews.Content: checked pet charge smoking smoking sometimes encountered sold nonsmoking reeking smoke nevertheless stayed 4 nights enjoyed minute restaurant offered sumptuous meals able accommodate special dietary party excellent food music service features loved shower surprisingly roomy compared hotel showers previously encountered italy stones throw lake eur major shopping mall store restaurant options

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service, peaceful atmosphere, clear rooms.”
Reviews.Author: eviar4
Reviews.Content: service excellent staff polite trying satisfy clients staff afraid unemployment crisis breakfast rich interestingly hotel peaceful unfortunately stay nights definitely prefere stay time visit rome despite unfavorable location eur outside historical center

Reviews.Title: “Sea-resort-style hotel in the metropoly...”
Reviews.Author: Dorotka_BS
Reviews.Content: dont believe pictures hotels website bring images luxury resort whereas ordinary hotel business travelers commercial park nearby wouldnt stay private trip ok steam bath plus noise street underneath makes calm night window impossible breakfast modest thumbs choice pastry possibility getting coffee bar buffet table vile apart eat staff speaks hardly english welcoming distance city centre

Reviews.Title: “Why close parts of this 'resort' during the busiest time of the year for tourists??”
Reviews.Author: killickgolly
Reviews.Content: busy road bustling traffic lots noise sadly exactly expect head double king size bed arrival found single beds pushed instead advertised resort book sounded fantastic able site sadly closed restaurant means walk eat shops closed bar 1900 hours poor indeed tip basically book august dissapointed car hire distance car sat nav easily vatican museum etc worth visit resort live 4 star standard throughout stay lucky achieved 1 star staff bothered closed suggested taxi various resulted huge cost taxis expensive italy
